channel.title: amk on Meltemcita
channel.description: Recent content in amk on Meltemcita

item.title: 2nd note
item.description: Small Thinking Sometimes in life, we are not aware of decisions or things that lead us to huge new experiences or changes. Even when meeting people, they only cross our ways and we let them enter, pass and forget. It’s more difficult to build a one-to-one connection that’s stable across time than to meet new people. I think you also as a valuable person, someone who is curious and let that curiosness enter.

item.title: 3th note
item.description: UH UH OH OH MelDem, You’re one of the funniest persons I’ve ever met. Really. And I have really fun friends here in Perú… but you’re like IDK just take it you mdfkcking Meltem language girl squirrel llama human hybrid. For example, look at this photo. WTF. Fcking art. Your hands, omg. accurate AF. I like the way you take things bcs life it can be actually a joke (you’ll see when you take your mushrooms-lsd trip) that’s the best approach.
